name: Sleepy Fighter Pilot
description:
Try and stay awake. All the coffee you need and all the bogeys you want!

As your sight fades from exhaustion, drink some coffee to stay in the fight.
But watch out! Caffeine has some serious effects.

Battle the controls as you get more and more wired and see how long you can go.
And how many bad guys you can take down.

Made for LD40 by the world's most okayist game designer, worst programmer and best ms paint artist.
